arts.ttl: Glasner pleased with response to QPR challenge
arts.sum: Oliver Glasner was pleased with the control his Crystal Palace exerted away from home against a testing Queens Park Rangers side.

arts.ttl: Oliver Glasner praises ‘unbelievable’ Eberechi Eze after Crystal Palace beat QPR
arts.sum: The England midfielder’s second-half strike settled the contest.

arts.ttl: Report: Point apiece as Palace draw PL International Cup opener v Sociedad
arts.sum: Crystal Palace Under-21s began their defence of the Premier League International Cup with a draw against Real Sociedad. Adler Nascimento levelled proceedings with his first goal of the season while Jemiah Umolu briefly put Palace ahead.

arts.ttl: Eberechi Eze returns to haunt QPR as Crystal Palace show Carabao Cup intent
arts.sum: Work to do for Oliver Glasner but the Eagles show promise at Loftus Road as Eddie Nketiah impresses

arts.ttl: Eberechi Eze stars on return to QPR as Crystal Palace progress in Carabao Cup
arts.sum: The England international scored one goal and set up the other in a 2-1 win.

arts.ttl: Nketiah bags first Palace goal after quick-thinking from Eze
arts.sum: Eddie Nketiah scores against QPR to open his account for Crystal Palace.

arts.ttl: Live Blog: QPR v Crystal Palace
arts.sum: Crystal Palace take on Championship outfit Queens Park Rangers tonight, seeking progression to the Carabao Cup fourth round – follow live updates from Loftus Road below!

arts.ttl: ‘Nice to have him back’ – Marti Cifuentes delivers verdict on exciting QPR reunion with £60m star
arts.sum: QPR boss Marti Cifuentes has said it will be ‘nice’ to have Ebere Eze back at Loftus Road… The post ‘Nice to have him back’ – Marti Cifuentes delivers verdict on exciting QPR reunion with £60m star appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace and Ipswich Now Eye Chelsea Star Ben Chilwell
arts.sum: Crystal Palace and Ipswich Town are both eyeing a potential move for Chelsea outcast Ben Chilwell in 2025.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace enquire about signing Real Sociedad striker for January
arts.sum: It’s fair to say that the start of this season hasn’t gone as well as expected at Crystal Palace. After an end to the 2023/24 campaign that saw Oliver Glasner’s men take on all-comers, they’ve stuttered so far in 2024/25.
